（校区市街地の中は建物が多くて動きにくいけど、\nフラットスピンを駆使すれば最短:
(There are a lot of buildings inside the school district, so it's hard to move around
If I use Flat Spin, I should be able to get close to the enemy at the shortest possible distance...)
（あ、機体がビルの壁をかすめちゃった……物音には気を付けないと。\nせっかくの奇:
(Ah, the aircraft grazed the wall of the building... I have to be careful of the noise.)
The timing of this surprise attack is going to be ruined...!)
（見えた、あれは……ドロテアさんのＭＧ！\nこの距離なら、一気に加速すれば――！:
(I see, that's... Dorothea's MG!
At this distance, if I accelerate all at once――!)
っ……！ 浅い！ すみません、しくじりました！: ...! Too shallow! I'm sorry, I messed up!
いい奇襲です……まさかこのわたくしが先手を取られるとは。\nしかも、回避が間に合:
That's a good surprise attack... I didn't think I'd make the first move.
Not only that, but we haven't been able to dodge in time... Not bad!
ダメージを与えられただけ上々ですわ！\n次はわたくし達が――続きますわよ！:
I'm just doing some damage, that's all!
We'll be the next ones—continue!
ドロテアに火力を集中すりゃあいいんでしょ！？\n一気に叩き込んでやるわよ！:
We just need to focus our firepower on Dorothea, right?!
I'll slam it into you all at once!
奇襲で私を孤立させ、その隙に後衛を倒す……と。\n作戦としては悪くありませんが、:
He said he'd isolate me with a surprise attack and use that opportunity to defeat the rear guard...
It's not a bad strategy, but don't you think you underestimate our team?
ピクシス・マスールはわたくしだけで、\n成り立っているわけではありませんのよ？:
I was the only Pixis Masulu,
It's not built on anything, you know?
っ……！ 他の４機がドロテアさんの援護に……！？: ...! The other four are supporting Dorothea?!
ミリアム、ケイト、ハリエット！ あたしに続け！！\nピクシス・マスールを舐めたオ:
Millium, Kate, Harriet! Follow me!
I'll make you pay for licking Pixis Masulu!!
防御が堅すぎる。これじゃ前に出られない。: My defenses are too tight. I can't move forward like this.
攻めようとしても邪魔されるし、下がろうとしても迎撃される……！\nまさかドロテア:
Even if I tried to attack, they'd get in my way, and even if I did, they would intercept me...!
I didn't think anyone but Dorothea would be this strong...!
だからって諦める訳にはいかないのよ！\n攻めろ攻めろ攻めろー！:
But that doesn't mean I can give up!
Attack, attack, attack!
何故、奴らはシリウスシュガーを一気に撃墜しにかからない？\n彼女達の実力なら難し:
Why aren't they shooting down Sirius Sugar in one go?
It wouldn't be difficult with the girls' abilities. There was no need to go out of their way to continue the attack.
奴等の動き、まるで時間を稼いでいるように見えるが――: Their movements look like they're stalling for time.
アゲぽよ～！！ Ｆｌ∞ｔｙだよ～♪\nトレブルクインテット参上しました～！:
Agepo! It's Fleighty! ♪
Treburg Intett has arrived!
フルート、配信じゃないんだから、Ｆｌ∞ｔｙはないでしょ。: Flute, it's not a broadcast, so there's no Fleighty.
まさか……勝手に生配信してないよね？ 撮影もしてないよね！？: Don't tell me... They didn't broadcast it live on their own, did they? They didn't film it, either!
し、してないしてない！\nまっさかー、エヴィちゃんってば疑り深いですよ～？:
N-No, I didn't!
Don't tell me you're so suspicious, Eve!
それじゃ、改めてみんな、バイブスあげていきますよ～！: Well then, everyone, let's give you the vibrators again!
なるほど……あいつらの目的はこれか……やってくれたな……！: I see... So this is their goal... They did it...!
反応が遅いですね！\nそんなんじゃ逃げられませんよー！ せーい！:
You're reacting too slowly!
You can't run away like that! Yay!
ピクシス・マスールとトレブルクインテットが組んでいたんだよ。\n俺達を最初に退場:
Pixis Masour and Treburg-Intette were working together.
To make us leave the stage first...!
はあ！？ なんだよそれ、卑怯すぎだろ！？\n強豪パイロットの名が泣くぞ！:
Huh?! What the hell? That's way too cowardly!
The name of a powerful pilot will make you cry!
そんなもの、勝手に泣かせておけばいいのです。\nそもそも、卑怯はほめ言葉。それが:
You can just make them cry on their own.
In the first place, cowardice is a compliment. If that's a battlefield, isn't that fine?
彼女の言う通り、ルールに反していない以上、\nそれも戦略ってことね。:
As she said, as long as it didn't go against the rules,
That's part of the strategy.
大した貴族様だ。少々見くびっていた……！: You're quite the noble. I underestimated you a little...!
貴族というからには正面から叩き潰しに来るかと思っていたが\nまさか卑怯な手段も厭:
Since he was a noble, I'd assumed he'd come to crush me head-on
I didn't think he was a strategist who wouldn't hesitate to resort to cowardly tactics...!
これで戦況はこちらに有利ですよ～！: With this, the war situation is in our favor!
だからといって、変に突っ込んでいかないでよ？\nフォローするの、大変なんだから。:
But that doesn't mean you're going to charge in weirdly, okay?
It's hard to follow up.
大人しく降参すれば、痛い目を見ずに済みますが？: If you surrender quietly, you won't have to suffer any pain.
ああ、このままじゃまずいな。\n俺達だけじゃ数的劣位を覆せない……:
Yeah, this isn't good.
We can't overturn numerical inferiority on our own...
なに諦めてんのよ！ まだまだこれからでしょうが！: What are you giving up on?! We still have a long way to go!
諦めるしかないんだよ。――ま、俺達だけなら、の話だけどな。: We have no choice but to give up. Well, if it's just us, that is.
はぁっ！？ な、何故に他のＭＧが！？: Huh?! Wh-Why are there other MGs?!
……まさか、その機体……特別養成校舎！？: ...Could that machine be... a special training building?!
遅れてごめーん！ 思っていたよりも隙がなくって！\n準備に手間取った！:
Sorry I'm late! There's more openings than I thought!
It took a while to get ready!
これ、全部撃っていい人達なんだよね～？: They're all good people to shoot, right?
メイズシフターじゃないから……いけるわ！: I'm not a maise shifter, so... I can do it!
トレブルクインテットは私達がおさえる！\nシリウスシュガーはやらせないから！:
We'll hold the Treburg Integrity!
I won't let you do the Sirius Sugar!
いやちょっと待って！ これさすがにルール違反では～！？: Wait a minute! Isn't this against the rules?!
ふふっ……未登録チームの戦闘介入を禁止する、\nとはルールに記載されていませんわ:
Hehe... I forbid unregistered teams from intervening in battle,
That's not written in the rules.
屁理屈？ 卑怯？ 好きなだけ言ってくれて構わないぞ。\n戦場において、ほめ言葉だ:
Fartically? Cowardly? You can say as much as you want.
It's a compliment on the battlefield, after all.
くっ……げ、限度があるでしょう……！？: Ugh... Th-There's a limit, isn't there?!
はっ！ 面白い！ でも、ここまでコケにされちゃ、\n我慢ならないね！:
Hah! Interesting! But if you make fun of me this much,
I can't stand it!
いや、これはさすがに卑怯すぎだろ……: No, this is way too cowardly...
ひ、卑怯でも、仲間を守れるならば正義ですっ！\nさすが、%usernameuse:
Even if it's cowardly, as long as I can protect my friends, it'll be justice!
That's %usernameusernameuserna% for you!!
さあ、ここからが本番だぞお前ら！\nこのカオスな戦場を制したチームが勝者だ！:
Now, the real battle begins!
The team that controls this chaotic battlefield is the winner!
